gazump.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if you are gazumped, the person who is selling you a house sells it to another person who offers them more money
gazump.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: We were gazumped at the last minute.
gazump.translation[1].definitions[0].def: if you are gazumped, someone who has agreed to sell you a house at an agreed price sells it to someone else for more money
gazump.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: If any client of our agency is gazumped, we refund him or her the cost of the valuation fee.
